import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

for i in range(n):
    s = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()
    k = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    if k > len(s):
        print(s)
    else:
        print(s[:k] + '...')


import sys

def main():
    k, s = input(), input()
    if k > len(s):
        print(s)
    else:
        print(s[:k] + '...')

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# -----Answer-----

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s)

# -----Answer-----
def shorten(s, k):
    return s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s

k, s = input(), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s)


k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s)
